name: Luck be a Developer
description:
Luck be a Developer is a unique roguelike deckbuilder. Choose your items and modifiers to spin enough to build your house. With items over 200 items and modifiers there are endless ways to play. There are no in-app purchases of any kind.

Spin 6 "Pie Slices" into a "Pizza Pie" with the "Pizza Slicer"
Combine some Fruit to make a "Pie" using the "Pie Crust"
Feed your "Snake" some "Eggs" to get a bonus.
and many many more...

We will be adding new items, modifiers and features to the game so look out for updates.
